  • All Classes
 

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandLineOptions
    Defines several position-independent command-line options, along with the CommandLineOptions.parse(String[]) method for populating corresponding fields from the command line at runtime, and accessor methods to interrogate the resulting option values.
    ConsoleMain
    Implements entry point for console-mode implementation of "One Hundred", a simple form of the Nim category of mathematical games.
    ConsoleSession  
    ConsoleSolitaireReferee
    Manages user interaction—with corresponding updates to the game state—through completion of a single solitaire (user against computer) game.
    ConsoleSolitaireReferee.Builder
    Concrete implementation of the Builder pattern used for constructing instances of ConsoleSolitaireReferee.
    Game
    Encapsulates the configuration and current state of a single game of One Hundred.
    Game.Operation
    Encapsulates the possible "directions" of play—that is, the arithmetic operation performed in all moves of a game using a given Operation enumerated value.
    Game.State
    Encapsulates the possible states of a single Game, as well as validation of all state-changing operations.
    GameFinishedException
    Represents the exceptional condition resulting from an attempt to make a move in a game that is already completed.
    GamePresentation<T>
    Declares methods that will construct and return presentations of game status, move prompts, error messages, etc.
    IllegalConfigurationException
    Represents the exceptional condition arising when the initial configuration of a Game is not valid.
    IllegalMoveException
    Represents the exceptional condition resulting from an attempt to make an invalid move in an ongoing game.
    OptimalStrategy
    Implements an optimal strategy for the normal (non-misère) form of the One Hundred game.
    RandomStrategy
    Implements a random strategy for the normal (non-misère) form of the One Hundred game.
    Referee
    Encapsulates the enforcement of the rules of the game, along with updates to the game state.
    Referee.Builder<B extends Referee.Builder<B>>
    Implements (partially) the Builder pattern for constructing instances of Referee.
    Session
    Generalizes launch of user interaction session and access to command-line arguments.
    Strategy
    Declares the abstract method Strategy.getNextMove(Game) (which must be implemented in a concrete subclass), as well as the concrete method Strategy.getRng() (providing a source of randomness to a concrete implementation), along with the overloaded Strategy.newInstance(String) and Strategy.newInstance(String, Random) static factory methods.
    Strategy.StrategyInitializationException
    Encapsulates an unchecked exception, thrown when instantiation of a concrete subclass of Strategy fails, for any reason.
    TextGamePresentation
    Implements the GamePresentation<T> for the String type.
